title: Setsuna’s Regulars
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>So, this is a Tokyo school idol shop huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! There are 5 other places that I know of!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That many!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah. Usually each shop has about 3 more shops around it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Umm, Setsuna-san, can you take me to the other shops as well?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you. When I’m home, I have to tell Ruby about this….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>If you’d like, next time we can go around with Ruby! I’ve also been wanting to discover new shops!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Really!? I can already see Ruby jumping with joy….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu! With the three of us, let’s conquer all of Tokyo’s school idol shops!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
